question: How do you show friends and family you care?

answers.answer: Tie up their shoe laces, so they don’t fall over
You show them how to access your favourite UniProt webinars
I watch them sleep and sing a lullaby if they wake up

question: How do UniProt help scientific communities in their research?

answers.answer: Hiring people to read scientific papers
By creating new protein-heavy recipes for you to try at home
By sending long letters to Santa
By suggesting emojis that can be used to replace punctuation marks in their publications
Using bribery, bananas and Greggs gift cards

question: At the annual UniProt disco, how would you spend your time?

answers.answer: At the centre of the dance floor showing the team how to “time walk”
Rocking back and forth in a corner, wishing for the end to come sooner
At the side both looking for people you know and counting the number of people wearing pink
On social media, documenting your time at the disco
By having fun, but ensuring that I periodically refer to the health and safety documentation and make sure all the fire exits are clear

question: Do you know who Batman is?

answers.answer: No. This is a stupid question

question: Which freely available online resource can I use to find functional information on proteins?

answers.answer: I prefer to email the Universities and Science Minister for England directly for all science- and nature-based questions
My great aunt is very resourceful and is always online
I’ll ask my friends what they use
Did you say free?! How do you pay your staff?
No, but don’t tell my cat
If you do, I do, we all do
A sufficient number of amino acids required to use the peptide search tool on the UniProt website
An ok number, if you really think I need a third person to cut my hair

question: When doing a new household task do you...

answers.answer: Hire a sky-writer to tell the world
A few fun-filled busy days with friends and families blast searching proteins
You alone on a beach with the UniProt homepage open
A holiday without UniProt, but knowing it’s there if I need it
You and a loved one in a big city with UniProt only a click away on your phones
The opportunity to visit the home countries of all the UniProt members of staff would be a dream come true. Can you make this happen?

question: Which of these things makes you happy?

answers.answer: Running the ID mapping tool on the UniProt website
A hug from an expert scientific curator
Giggling and jiggling like a giggling jiggling purple jelly

question: Which of these things makes you unhappy?

answers.answer: To know where to begin when there is too much functional information on the UniProt website
Being on holiday without the internet access to search UniProt
Yes, when I have an audience
I like to do the funky chicken when no one is watching

question: How does success make you feel?

answers.answer: Overjoyed and makes me want to tell the whole world
Motivated to use the advanced search in UniProt
Warm and fuzzy like Winnie the Pooh
Like decorating the room with stars, so that they are within reach of everybody
The sunshine from inside my house
Beethoven. In particular, the second movie with all the little puppies!

question: What do you like to read?

answers.answer: Long drawn-out adventure books with lots of characters
Books with no more than 5 pages
Whatever the person on the train next to me is reading, so long as they explain the funny bits to me
